title: Your zodiac sign is 2,000 years out of date
description: Your zodiac sign may be inaccurate. Ancient astronomers based signs on constellations. Earth's wobble has shifted these star patterns over 2,000 years. Belief in astrology persists due to its adaptability.

title: 'Stop pursuing projects that …': Microsoft AI chief's message to developers
description: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman urges developers to abandon research into AI consciousness, stating only biological beings possess this trait. Suleyman believes pursuing AI consciousness is a misplaced and absurd endeavor.

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman expressed envy for today's young entrepreneurs, particularly college dropouts, citing the vast opportunities and advanced AI tools that enable rapid product development.  He also reflected on the personal cost of leading OpenAI, admitting the company consumes his mental space, preventing him from pursuing new startup ideas.

title: This city has no cars, no pollution, clean water — and even solar-powered bins
description: Freiburg, Germany, showcases a sustainable urban future with its widespread solar energy, car-free mobility, and integrated green culture. This university city prioritizes cycling and public transport, featuring energy-efficient homes and community involvement. Freiburg offers a compelling model for cities worldwide, proving that ecological living enhances quality of life and fosters happier societies.

title: Taylor Swift fears for her safety as Travis Kelce focuses on new season
description: Taylor Swift is reportedly concerned about her security and privacy, wanting to avoid excessive media attention during Kansas City Chiefs games. While not asking for broadcasts to stop, she desires to maintain a lower profile. Meanwhile, Travis Kelce praised Swift's latest album, "The Life of a Showgirl," on his podcast, highlighting its success.

title: Stefon Diggs’ alleged K’yanna Barber affair escalates as Cardi B expects baby
description: Rapper Cardi B is reportedly expecting twins with NFL player Stefon Diggs, but the couple faces controversy. Diggs is also accused of fathering twins with another woman, K’yanna Barber, a situation neither party has publicly addressed. This alleged infidelity has caused fan uproar as Cardi B continues to share her pregnancy publicly.

title: Musk, Rogan talk about alien object aiming at Earth that Harvard scientist say 'isn't natural'
description: Unauthorized SpaceX Starshield transmissions coincide with intense scrutiny of Comet 3I/ATLAS, an interstellar object exhibiting anomalous characteristics. Discussions on The Joe Rogan Experience podcast, featuring Elon Musk, explored potential alien probes and the Tunguska Event, fueled by astrophysicist Avi Loeb's claims of extraterrestrial origins for the comet.

title: Shane Bieber’s wife reacts to Alejandro Kirk’s wife’s viral World Series post
description: Blue Jays catcher Alejandro Kirk's stellar World Series performance is matched by the heartwarming social media buzz surrounding his wife, Sofia Castaneda. A simple emoji comment from Shane Bieber's wife, Kara, on Sofia's post celebrating Kirk's success ignited a viral moment, highlighting the strong camaraderie among the team's families and captivating fans.
